scripts.build: bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/abis' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/utils' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/core' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/rpc' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/runner' build
scripts.build:analyze: bun run build:analyze:abis && bun run build:analyze:utils && bun run build:analyze:core && bun run build:analyze:pathfinder && bun run build:analyze:rpc
scripts.dev: bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/utils' dev & bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/core' dev & bun run --filter '@circles-sdk/rpc' dev
scripts.examples: bun run example:core && bun run example:rpc
scripts.example:core: for file in examples/core/*.ts; do echo "\n=== Running $file ===\n" && bun run "$file"; done
scripts.example:rpc: for file in examples/rpc/*.ts; do echo "\n=== Running $file ===\n" && bun run "$file"; done
